review:
The movie is almost like a late 80's and throughout 90's decade's typical romantic Bollywood film which is why I liked it very much as I am also a 90's kid. ğŸ˜Š 
Tiger looked like a typical 80's & 90's chocolate-boy hero and resembled Aamir Khan & Salman Khan in their initial years of Bollywood! Kriti looked damn attractive throughout the film. Sugandha was also good in her role.
I liked it more as it has no 'bed or sex scenes' between the lead actors as they're not married. 
Such clean films are ...MORE

The movie is almost like a late 80's and throughout 90's decade's typical romantic Bollywood film which is why I liked it very much as I am also a 90's kid. ğŸ˜Š 
Tiger looked like a typical 80's & 90's chocolate-boy hero and resembled Aamir Khan & Salman Khan in their initial years of Bollywood! Kriti looked damn attractive throughout the film. Sugandha was also good in her role.
I liked it more as it has no 'bed or sex scenes' between the lead actors as they're not married. 
Such clean films are made very less nowadays.
